verbs.description: [ARG1: sunny warm weather] [V: continues] [ARG2: for colorado temperatures] will jump above average throughout the remainder of the weekend thanks to a large area of high pressure over the region the high on saturday reached 70 degrees at dia sunday will be the warmest day of the week with highs in the low 70s weather colorado denver
